hadiths.text: The aforesaid tradition has also been transmitted by abu-Said al-Khudri to the same effect to a different chain of narrators, attributing it to the Messenger of Allah (May peace be upon him). Abu-Dawud said :Ibn ‘Uyainah reported from Zaid, from whom Malik narrated and Thwari narrated from Zaid that an authentic narrator reported from the Messenger of Allah (May peace be upon him)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ يَجُوزُ لَهُ أَخْذُ الصَّدَقَةِ وَهُوَ غَنِيٌّ
chapter.eng-name: The Rich Person Who Is Allowed To Accept Sadaqah
